name: spin-the-wheel-signage
description: Interactive Spin the Wheel digital signage game system

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:mobile" "npm run dev:signage" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../mobile-form && npm install && cd ../signage-display && npm install && cd ../admin-dashboard && npm install
scripts.build: cd mobile-form && npm run build && cd ../signage-display && npm run build && cd ../admin-dashboard && npm run build
